metadata.title: CVE-2018-20673 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The demangle_template function in cplus-dem.c in GNU libiberty, asdistributed in GNU Binutils 2.31.1, contains an integer overflowvulnerability (for "Create an array for saving the template argumentvalues") that can trigger a heap-based buffer overflow, as demonstrated bynm.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
